description: Get the perfect balance of speed and reliability for HD video and faster shot-to-shot performance with SanDisk Extreme HD Video SDHCTM cards. Delivering Class 6 video performance with up to 20MB/sec read/write speeds1, you'll be ready to capture HD video on the latest digital point & shoot cameras and DSLRs that have high-definition video recording capabilities.
title: Sandisk 8GB EXTREME SDHC SD Card Class 6 (SDSDX3-8192 Bulk Package)
